name: Together (itch) (Arkae)
description:
A struggling couple is looking to repair their relationship, but standard couple's therapy just didn't cut it. Now they must confront a nefarious witch who lives in a mysterious cave under a magic mountain (as most couples do).

Navigate increasingly challenging floors while cursed (spoilers!) to move as both players simultaneously.

  • Solve your quarrels as you avoid kinda creepy creatures that call this cave home.
  • Bask in the aesthetic of hand-made pixel-art and overly-hyphenated sentences.
  • Don't enjoy the catchy soundtrack. There isn't one.

-I hope you have a great time playing my first game to go to market. If you have any questions or comments, feel free to contact me. I'd love to hear from you.

-For the sake of checking out the game, you can use F11 and F12 to navigate back and forth through the levels.

<3
